name: Cosmosiege
description:
A space odyssey would not have been so interesting if scientists had not forgotten to turn off the protection system on half-abandoned radio towers, which it would be time to dismantle. Brave daredevils with weak minds are sent on a super-important mission.
Your task is to help the astronauts dismantle the towers from the surface of the planet by destroying them with the astronauts' improvised means. Disembarkation alone or in groups, it's up to you. With each new level, both the difficulty and your ability to land more qualified specialists increase. Radio towers use various self-defense protocols, so think carefully about tactics.

Cosmosiege is a reverse tower defense auto battle game. The task at each level is to destroy the towers located in the center of the screen with the help of summoned combat units.

Game Features:
- Funny astronauts
- Increasing game difficulty
- Cheerful soundtrack
